TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ZoneIdentityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission
Public NotInheritable Class ZoneIdentityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission
public ref class ZoneIdentityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission

summary.span: 定義程式碼來源區域的識別權限。

span.span: Defines the identity permission for the zone from which the code originates.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此權限，可以判斷呼叫的程式碼是否從特定區域。This permission can determine whether calling code is from a certain zone. 區域根據 Microsoft Internet Explorer 選項中，設定和 URL 對應的 Internet Explorer IInternetSecurityManager 和相關的 Api。Zones are configured according to the Microsoft Internet Explorer options, and are mapped from URL by Internet Explorer's IInternetSecurityManager and related APIs. 只能將區域完全相符項目定義的權限;URL 只能屬於一個區域。Only exact zone matches are defined for the permission; a URL can only belong to one zone. - 近端內部網路區域： 近端內部網路區域用於位於公司內部網路上的內容。Local intranet zone: The Local intranet zone is used for content located on a company's intranet. 因為伺服器是在公司防火牆內，內部網路上的內容會指派較高的信任等級。Because the servers are within a company's firewall, content on the intranet is assigned a higher level of trust. - 信任的網站區域： 信任的網站區域的內容會被視為較聲譽良好或比在網際網路上的其他網站值得信任的 Web 站台上使用。Trusted sites zone: The Trusted sites zone is used for content located on Web sites that are considered more reputable or trustworthy than other sites on the Internet. 使用者可以使用此區域指派到特定的網際網路站台的較高的信任等級。Users can use this zone to assign a higher level of trust to specific Internet sites. 使用者需要將這些信任網站的 URL 對應至這個區域。The URLs of these trusted Web sites need to be mapped into this zone by the user. 根據預設，信任的網站區域中的網站會接收比網際網路區域中沒有較高的信任。By default, sites in the Trusted sites zone receive no higher trust than those in the Internet zone. 使用者或公司需要變更以獲得更高的信任層級授與給這個區域，如果他們想要在站台信任層級。A user or company needs to change the level of trust granted to this zone if they want the sites it contains to be given a higher level of trust. - 網際網路區域： 網際網路區域用於網際網路上，網站不屬於其他區域。Internet zone: The Internet zone is used for the Web sites on the Internet that do not belong to another zone. 預設設定允許從這些站台只有最少存取下載到使用者的電腦上的資源的程式碼。The default settings allow code downloaded from these sites only minimal access to resources on the user's computer. 未對應到其他區域自動網站歸類到此區域。Web sites that are not mapped into other zones automatically fall into this zone. - 限制的網站區域： 網站，其中包含可能會導致或可能已經先前發生問題時下載的內容使用限制的網站區域。Restricted sites zone: The Restricted sites zone is used for Web sites that contain content that could cause, or could have previously caused, problems when downloaded. 這個區域可以用來防止從使用者的電腦上執行這些站台下載的程式碼。This zone could be used to prevent code downloaded from these sites from running on the user's computer. 使用者需要將這些未受信任網站的 URL 對應至這個區域。The URLs of these untrusted Web sites need to be mapped into this zone by the user. - 區域： 本機區域會隱含區域，用於在使用者電腦存在的內容。Local Machine zone: The Local Machine zone is an implicit zone that is used for content that exists on the user's computer. 除了在本機系統上，Internet Explorer 所快取內容的使用者的電腦上找到的內容來處理極高的信任層級。The content found on the user's computer, except for content cached by Internet Explorer on the local system, is treated with a very high level of trust. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不會使用身分識別的權限。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used. > > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別權限的要求是有效的即使是完全受信任的呼叫組件。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但識別權限的要求會失敗組件不符合要求的準則。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，識別權限的要求是如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任的效果不佳。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會識別權限的特殊情況的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state) cil managed

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立完全限制 (`None`) 或`Unrestricted`權限。Creates either a fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` permission. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別的權限不能有權限狀態的值。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, identity permissions cannot have an permission state value. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，識別權限可以有任何權限狀態的值。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, identity permissions can have any permission state value. 這表示在 2.0 和更新版本中，身分識別的權限具有相同的行為，做為實作的權限介面。This means that in 2.0 and later versions, identity permissions have the same behavior as permissions that implement the interface. 也就是身分識別的要求一定會成功，不論的身分識別的組件中，如果組件授與完全信任。That is, a demand for an identity always succeeds, regardless of the identity of the assembly, if the assembly has been granted full trust. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，身分識別權限的要求是有效的即使是完全受信任的呼叫組件。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted. 也就是說，雖然呼叫組件具有完全信任，但識別權限的要求會失敗組件不符合要求的準則。That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，識別權限的要求是如果呼叫的組件具有完全信任的效果不佳。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust. 如此可確保所有的權限，不會識別權限的特殊情況的一致性。This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case. ## Examples 下列範例示範使用建構函式。The following example shows the use of the constructor. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission/CS/zoneidentity.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ZoneIdentityPermission/VB/zoneidentity.vb#7)]

exception.span: 參數不是有效的 值。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid value of .

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限的相同複本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一份權限表示與原始的權限資源相同的存取權。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Intersect(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Intersect (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限產生交集的權限。

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立並傳回目前權限與指定權限交集的權限。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限交集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集是空的，這個新使用權限為 。

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個權限的交集會描述一組共同兩者描述的作業的權限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有通過這兩個原始的使用權限的需求會通過交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 相同的兩個交集物件是相同的權限。The intersection of two identical objects is the same permission. 導致權限的任何其他組合`null`。Any other combination results in a permission that is `null`.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

param.name: target

summary.span: 判斷目前權限是否為指定權限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果目前的使用權限是指定之使用權限的子集，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前權限是指定權限的子集，兩個權限是否相等，或如果目前權限代表內部網路安全性區域。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the two permissions are equal or if the current permission represents the security zone.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，這個使用權限不代表 安全性區域 (Security Zone)，且指定使用權限不等於目前使用權限。

span.span: The parameter is not , this permission does not represent the security zone, and the specified permission is not equal to the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.IPermission Union(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 要與目前權限結合的權限，

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 必須與目前權限屬於相同的類型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 建立目前權限與指定權限聯集的權限。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: 代表目前權限與指定權限聯集的新權限。

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要呼叫的結果是代表權限的安全性區域，表示由目前的權限和指定的權限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents the security zone represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. 傳遞其中一個權限的任何要求會傳遞它們的聯集。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 聯集的兩個相同物件是相同的權限。The union of two identical objects is the same permission. Null 的權限的聯集和權限是不是 null 的權限。The union of a null permission and a permission is the permission that is not null. 請注意，物件，代表內部網路安全性區域是視為 null 的權限，處理做為特殊案例。Note that a object representing a security zone is treated as a null permission and handled as a special case. 聯集的物件，代表內部網路安全性區域和 null 之權限為 null。The union of a object representing the security zone and a null permission is null. 兩個不同的區域識別權限的聯集產生兩者皆非的兩個權限代表時擲回例外狀況內部網路安全性區域。The union of two different zone identity permissions results in an exception being thrown when neither of the two permissions represents the security zone.

exception.span: 參數不是 ，而且與目前使用權限不是相同的型別。

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.
-or-

exception.span: 兩個使用權限不相等，且目前使用權限不代表 安全性區域。

span.span: The two permissions are not equal and the current permission does not represent the security zone.
